com.ning.billing.entitlement.api.transfer

Interface EntitlementTransferApi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEntitlementTransferApi

    public interface EntitlementTransferApi
    The interface EntitlementTransferApi is used to transfer a bundle from one account to another account.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SubscriptionBundle transferBundle(UUID sourceAccountId, UUID destAccountId, String bundleKey, org.joda.time.DateTime requestedDate, boolean transferAddOn, boolean cancelImmediately, CallContext context) 

    • Method Detail

      • transferBundle

        SubscriptionBundle transferBundle(UUID sourceAccountId,
                                UUID destAccountId,
                                String bundleKey,
                                org.joda.time.DateTime requestedDate,
                                boolean transferAddOn,
                                boolean cancelImmediately,
                                CallContext context)
                                  throws EntitlementTransferApiException
        Parameters:
        sourceAccountId - the unique id for the account on which the bundle will be transferred from
        destAccountId - the unique id for the account on which the bundle will be transferred to
        bundleKey - the externalKey for the bundle
        requestedDate - the date at which this transfer should occur
        transferAddOn - whether or not we should also transfer ADD_ON subscriptions existing on that SubscriptionBundle
        cancelImmediately - whether cancellation on the sourceAccount occurs immediately
        context - the user context
        Returns:
        the newly created SubscriptionBundle
        Throws:
        EntitlementTransferApiException - if the system could not transfer the SubscriptionBundle
